meanings.definition: (ラテン語) 通り過ぎる、過ぎ去る、無視する、見過ごす、省略する
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) to go by, pass by, pass over, disregard, omit

examples.translation: 沈黙のうちにやり過ごす（無視する）。
私はそれを省略したくない。

etymology.value: ラテン語の「praeter」（～を越えて、～のそばを）+ 「ire」（行く）に由来。

verb_forms.present_active: praetereō, praeterīs, praeterit, praeterīmus, praeterītis, praetereunt
verb_forms.imperfect_active: praeterebam, praeterebās, praeterebat, praeterebāmus, praeterebātis, praeterebant
verb_forms.future_active: praeteribō, praeteribis, praeteribit, praeteribimus, praeteribitis, praeteribunt
verb_forms.perfect_active: praeteriī, praeteriistī, praeteriit, praeteriimus, praeteriistis, praeterierunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_active: praeterieram, praeterierās, praeterierat, praeterierāmus, praeterierātis, praeterierant
verb_forms.future_perfect_active: praeterierō, praeterieris, praeterierit, praeterierimus, praeterieritis, praeterierint
verb_forms.present_passive: praetereor, praetereris, praeteritur, praeterimur, praeterimini, praetereuntur
verb_forms.imperfect_passive: praeterebar, praeterebāris, praeterebatur, praeterebāmur, praeterebamini, praeterebantur
verb_forms.future_passive: praeteribor, praeteriberis, praeteribitur, praeteribimur, praeteribimini, praeteribuntur
verb_forms.perfect_passive: praeteritus sum, praeteritus es, praeteritus est, praeteriti sumus, praeteriti estis, praeteriti sunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_passive: praeteritus eram, praeteritus eras, praeteritus erat, praeteriti eramus, praeteriti eratis, praeteriti erant
verb_forms.future_perfect_passive: praeteritus ero, praeteritus eris, praeteritus erit, praeteriti erimus, praeteriti eritis, praeteriti erunt

usage_notes.explanation: 「praeterire」はラテン語の動詞で、様々な意味を持ちます。物理的に通り過ぎる、時間を経過する、何かを無視する、省略する、見過ごすといった意味合いがあります。文脈によってどの意味で使われているかを判断する必要があります。

derivatives: praeteritus (過去の、過ぎ去った、過去分詞)
praetereo (動詞の第一人称単数現在形)

readability_explanation.text: This entry describes the Latin verb 'praeterire'. Understanding its various meanings requires knowledge of Latin grammar and vocabulary.

example_sentences.translation: 機会を逃してはいけない。
私は多くのことを省略するだろう。
